original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 06:26:28' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 18:45:09' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=2 AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=5 AND u.DownVotes<=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-18 01:58:41' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND (CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 06:26:28' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 18:45:09')
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 2)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 5
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes <= 0 AND users.UpVotes >= 0 AND users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-18 01:58:41'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E2E4.UserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E6E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E4E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2E4E6.UserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E6E5E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E4E6E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E4E6E5.PostId=E3.PostId)
